short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An add-on to sync a Surnise Hubs Action Network data with a volunteer tracking spreadsheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on is intended for hubs of the Sunrise Movement.  The add-on will let you sync member data between your Action Network account and a volunteer tracking spreadsheet.  Details on how this works are available here: https://sites.google.com/view/sunrise-an-integration/home
